alert.note: Alert for Western Chelan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 12 at 1:57PM PDT until March 13 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 PM PDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations 5 to 10 inches for Stevens Pass. Localized amounts up to 15 inches for elevations above 5000 feet. * WHERE...Stehekin, Holden Village, and Stevens Pass. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 11 PM PDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Motorists planning to drive over Stevens Pass should prepare for winter driving conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
